closed_reason: Added async gc.Cleanup goroutine to tk board startup. Runs with 30-day max age, logs errors to stderr without failing startup. Note: tk run command doesn't exist yet (Phase 6), so GC will be added there when that command is implemented.
description: At startup of 'tk run' and 'tk board', call gc.Cleanup(30 days) in a goroutine (non-blocking). Log errors but don't fail startup.
title: Call gc.Cleanup async at tk run and tk board startup
